mapper.insert: insert into RACE (ID, RACE_NAME, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATETIME, COMMENTS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{raceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID, RACE_NAME, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATETIME, COMMENTS from RACE
